original_text: I hope you will put up with me in a little foolishness. Yes, please put up with me!
korean_text: 원하건대 너희는 나의 좀 어리석은 것을 용납하라 청하건대 나를 용납하라

sentences.original_text: I hope you will put up with me
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신이 저를 잘 참아주기를 바랍니다

sentences.original_text: Yes, please put up with me!
